addons.name: Weather Extension
addons.description: The best way to see the weather right in your browser. Easier than looking outside!
addons.fullDescription:
Automatically locates and displays your current weather, hourly and 5 day forecast. The app icon will automatically update to your current temperature. Very easy to use with more features coming soon!

Features
-----------------
* DarkSky Api
* Geolocation
* English, French, Spanish, Italian, Polish, Swedish, Russian, Portuguese, Chinese, Turkish and German support
* Multiple locations
* Animated icons
* Precipitation/Severe weather alerts
* Temperature in badge icon
* Set custom location by address or zip code
* Choose Fahrenheit or Celsius
* Settings sync between devices
* Weather Alerts
* Hourly forecast
* 5 day forecast
* 12h/24h time format
* Easy to use

screenshots.caption: A new radar view inside the extension
Multiple different options to customize your weather

addons.name: Privacy Badger
addons.description: Automatically learns to block invisible trackers.
addons.fullDescription:
Privacy Badger automatically learns to block invisible trackers. Instead of keeping lists of what to block, Privacy Badger learns by watching which domains appear to be tracking you as you browse the Web.

Privacy Badger sends the Do Not Track signal with your browsing. If trackers ignore your wishes, your Badger will learn to block them. Privacy Badger starts blocking once it sees the same tracker on three different websites.

Besides automatic tracker blocking, Privacy Badger removes outgoing link click tracking on Facebook, Google and Twitter, with more privacy protections on the way.

To learn more, see the FAQ on Privacy Badger's homepage.

Privacy Badger is a project of the Electronic Frontier Foundation.

screenshots.caption: Privacy Badger is a project of the Electronic Frontier Foundation
Privacy Badger at work on the whitehouse.gov privacy policy page.

addons.name: Tomato Clock
addons.description: Tomato Clock is a simple browser extension that helps with online time management.
addons.fullDescription:
Use Tomato Clock to break down your work sessions into 25 minute 'Tomato' intervals separated by short breaks. Take a longer break after completing four Tomato intervals.

Features:

* Customizable timer lengths
* Browser notifications
* Stat tracking

You can customize the length of the Tomatoes and breaks in the extension page. Tomato Clock uses the default browser notification system, accompanied by a sound, to let you know when the timer is up. Tomato Clock also features stats for tracking how many Tomatoes you complete. Your stats are synced across devices using the browser's cloud storage support.

Please file any issues or feature requests at https://github.com/samueljun/tomato-clock/issues.

screenshots.caption: Start your Tomatoes from the extension panel
Customize the length of your timers and if there's a notification sound
Track how many Tomatoes you accomplish in the stats page
